title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-7.3 - Periodic reviews
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-7.3 - Periodic reviews

State Regulations

The permittee must, at intervals not to exceed 12 months, review the release minimization program content and
implementation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
380-7.3

Amended

New

York State Register April 25, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 17, eff. 5/10/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
